official_title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the President should communicate immediately to the Government of the Soviet Union that the United States insists that the Soviet Union remove its military combat troops from Cuba, with all deliberate speed.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the Congress that the President should communicate to the Soviet Union that the United States insists that the Soviet Union remove all of its combat troops from Cuba.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution expressing the sense of Congress that the President should communicate immediately to the Government of the Soviet Union that the United States insists that the Soviet Union remove its military combat troops from Cuba, with all deliberate speed.
